data.text:
I was staying in March in Ramada Hotel I just want to share my experience in Ramada 

Nehaa from reception she was with us very polite and helpful she is a very hardworking she is always smiling and she was did a wonderful job and we don't have any complaints from the room it was a wonderful and housekeeping they are very helpful Al the time stay for our family I highly recommend to this hotel and all the best for Ur future nehaa and thank you so much for Ur all wonderful service Ramada hotel I wish Ur hotel will be more susses.

Breakfast was üëç
data.title: Good Good Good

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Pooja, Greetings From Ramada Plaza By Wyndham Dubai Deira!

Thank you for sharing your lovely feedback.

We always strive to provide the very best service for all our guests and we are pleased to receive positive feedback from our valued guest like you. We will be sure to share your good words with our Hosts, especially Neha who made your stay more pleasant with her dedicated service.

Your good words are so inspiring and we assure you that we will keep on providing the highest quality of service to all our guests.

We're looking forward to welcoming you back for a great stay again.

Thanking you,

Peter Shekhar
owner_response.author: Peter Shekhar

data.text: Cleanliness and Maintenance: "Rooms were spotless, and the facilities were well-maintained." "The hotel's cleanliness surpassed my expectations." Comfortable Accommodations: "Beds were exceptionally comfortable.but my overall thanks i will give to the reception staff ms divya and farhaz they are excellent in their services.... approach guest for help with smile and kind .... giving priority to guest needs is on top... thankyou so much for your helpful behaviour.in the end i will definitely recommend to my knowns to come  to ramada plaza .....
data.title: Appreciate the reception staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,Greetings from Ramada Plaza By Wyndham Dubai Deira !

We wanted to take a moment to express our heartfelt appreciation for your trust and loyalty. Knowing that we were once again able to deliver the best hospitality service and outperform our guests' expectations having reading your positive reference gives us immense confidence as a hotelier.
I'm happy to hear you are happy with the service provided by Divya and Farhad, Our intention is to make each guest's stay unforgettable by offering steadfast service that ensures your comfort.
On behalf of the entire team, we truly appreciate your genuine review and we look forward on your next stay with us.

Best regards,

Peter Shekhar
owner_response.author: Peter Shekhar

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Vibhora,

 It was our pleasure to have you with us Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Dubai Deira.

We are delighted to read your review regarding your recent stay at our Hotel, It gave us tremendous pleasure to read that you enjoyed our facilities and the genuine hospitality of our dedicated team members. Thank you for your generous appreciation over the service provided by our colleagues,  We will ensure they will get the recognition they deserve to receive.

Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Best Regards

Peter Shekhar
owner_response.author: Peter Shekhar

data.text:
The life guard is exelant his name is Ripon Kumar.
The room is clean. Like dry towel , fresh water 
The breakfast is good 
The location is ner metro station 
Take stuffs are kind and friendly.
We enjoyed swimming pool and spa .
The house kipping is exelant .

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you very much for your amazing feedback, it is with great happiness to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us and were impressed with the service of our team and all our hotel facilities.

Neha  will be thrilled to hear about your feedback, it is truly rewarding to know that we were able to provide satisfactory experience to our valued guests including you.

Our entire team is fulfilled to have been recognized in your generous feedback and we are more than delighted to welcome you back in the future.

Best regards,

Peter Shekhar
owner_response.author: Peter Shekhar
